pkgmetadata.longdescription: django-randompinfield======================Generates a random pin for your Django model field.Installation------------Install via pip:.. code:: bash $ pip install django-randompinfieldAdd to your installed apps:.. code:: python INSTALLED_APPS = ( ... 'randompinfield', ... )Usage------Import ``RandomPinField`` into your ``models.py``... code:: python from django.db import models from randompinfield import RandomPinField class MyModel(models.Model): slug = RandomPinField(length=3)The ``length`` is an optional argument.
